channel.title: LegionScape-317 Server- Dragon Smithing-Dragon Mining-Click For details
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/01Z3jj7.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://legion-scape.com/index.php"]Forums[/URL]
Server Information LegionScape is a brand new Runescape Private server with dragon smithing, Dragon Mining, Clan Factions, Prestige system, Solid Economy, Choose your path Saradomin, Guthix, or Zamorak. Special Perks with which path you choose, Faction Yell, Great Forum, Great Staff, All around a fun time.
Combat Stats: 100% Working Meele 100% Working Magic 100% Working Range 100% Working Attack 100% Working Defence 100% Working Prayer with curses.
Working Skills 100% Strength 100% Attack 100% Defense 100% Magic 100% Range 100% Prayer 100% Runecrafting 100% Summoning 100% Heath Points 100% Agility 100% Herblore 100% Thieving 100% Crafting 100% Fletching 100% Slayer 100% Hunter 100% Mining 100% Smithing 100% Fishing 100% Cooking 100% Firemaking 100% Woodcutting 100% Farming
Minigames & Bosses
Working King Black Dragon Working Corporeal Beast Working Nomad Working God Wars Working Kalphite Queen Working Tormented Demons Dagannoth Kings
Minigames Working Barrows Working Pest Control Working TzHarr Caves Working Duel Arena Working Warriors Guild Working Mage Arena
Corp: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vp2uaE1.png[/img]
Prayer: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NN0kvSL.png[/img]
Dragon Mining: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rEVvC2W.png[/img]
Dragon Smithing [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wMUrwT5.png[/img]
If You need more Pictures just ask![/CENTER]
